entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
Awoken Dreams is an independently ran clothing brand based out of Florida

My name is Trevor the owner of Awoken Kicks a premier sneaker storefront located in Panama City Florida. 

It has been a huge goal of mine to open up and start my own brand and it is finally coming to life. I wanted to create something that is in touch with todays style as well as be very interactive with my following through social media etc.

You guys will help me every step of the way through various polls on IG to feedback and suggestions. Feel free to reach out to me on IG @awoken__dreams or my personal cell 850-348-1569 with any questions etc.

I appreciate everyone who orders, looks, gives me a follow or even a like wouldn't be possible without you guys. Stay tuned for more designs and updates.
